articles.title: Elite colleges conspire to use early admissions to inflate costs, lawsuit says - The Washington Post
articles.description: A federal lawsuit accuses 32 elite universities of violating antitrust laws by using early decision admissions to inflate prices and reduce competition.

articles.title: Trump-Linked World Liberty Pitches a $1.5 Billion Crypto Vehicle - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Big investors are being sounded out on a plan for World Liberty Financial, the Trump family-backed venture, to set up a public company that would hold its WLFI tokens, joining the boom in digital-asset treasury firms.

articles.title: Trump wants your 401(k) to access crypto and private equity. Here's what to know. - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump signed an executive order that he says will democratize alternative investments for workers saving for retirement.

articles.title: Wall Street clocks another winning week - AP News
articles.description: Stocks rose on Wall Street, marking their third winning week in the last four. The S&P 500 rose 0.8% Friday, leaving the index just shy of the record it set last week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 0.5%, and the Nasdaq composite added 1% to the rec…

articles.title: Sam Altman: OpenAI will bring back GPT-4o after user backlash - Mashable
Heartflow Stock Soars 50% Above IPO Price in Latest Hot Debut - Barron's
Amtrak’s fastest train ever will be leaving out of Penn Station later this month - Time Out Worldwide
articles.description: It speeds into service on August 28

articles.title: Trade Desk Sentiment Collapses as Specter of Amazon Looms - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Trade Desk Inc. analysts are bailing on the one-time market favorite amid growing fears that its advertising technology will get steamrolled by Amazon.com Inc.’s offerings.

articles.title: Rocket Lab, Kratos Surge; Firefly IPO Falls In Volatile Day 2 - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Firefly Aerospace jumped during its Thursday IPO. Rocket Lab, Kratos Defense advance after earnings results.

articles.title: Apple Stock Retakes Key Level After Dodging Tariff Bullet - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Apple stock surged higher Friday on expectations that the consumer electronics giant will be exempt from U.S. tariffs.

articles.title: Why Trump's sweeping new tariffs are fueling stagflation concerns among economists - CBS News
articles.description: Economists caution new tariffs could pose economic risks, but the White House says growth is rebounding amid low inflation.

articles.title: Gold futures trade off highs as White House to issue clarification on bullion tariffs - CNBC
articles.description: Gold prices fell from a record high Friday after the White House said it will clarify "misinformation" about the precious metal facing tariffs.

articles.title: JPMorgan says it now sees four Fed rate cuts on the horizon as Trump nominates Miran to Fed - MarketWatch
articles.description: The bank’s chief U.S. economist now expects the Fed will deliver a rate cut in September, followed by three more in subsequent meetings

articles.title: Waterslide cracks open on world’s largest cruise ship, injuring one passenger - CNN
articles.description: An acrylic waterslide on Royal Caribbean’s Icon of the Seas broke open on Thursday, injuring one passenger and leaving a sizable hole in the bottom of the tubular slide.

articles.title: Trump’s clash with Intel’s CEO isn’t just politics — it’s a crucial test for U.S. chip making - MarketWatch
articles.description: While Lip-Bu Tan has drawn the president’s ire for his links to China, a potential rethink of Intel’s U.S. manufacturing ambitions may raise even bigger stakes for the White House

articles.title: Trump's Fed pick has envisioned a major overhaul of the central bank - Axios
articles.description: In the near term, Stephen Miran will, if confirmed, be a voice for President Trump's desired interest rate cuts.

articles.title: The Social Security tsunami: Payments could be cut by 23%, doubling the poverty rate for America's seniors - Fortune
articles.description: Understanding the future of Social Security, and the risks to your benefits.

articles.title: Dodge CEO Basically Confirms the V-8 Charger's Return: 'Don't Be Surprised if it Would Fit' - Motor1.com
articles.description: Dodge CEO Matt McAlear all but confirmed that the V-8 would be returning to the Charger, telling journalists, Don't be surprised if it would fit.
